description.value: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole. Choose any two of @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip}. Attempt both of the attacks you chose against the same or different creatures, but don't apply the multiple attack penalty until after resolving both attacks.
